info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 12 at 3:00AM MST until May 12 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff AZ
info.description:
...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MST /NOON MDT/ TO 7 PM MST /8 PM MDT/ TUESDAY...
* WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts from 35 to 45 mph. For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts from 50 to 60 mph.
* WHERE...Little Colorado River Valley.
* WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 11 AM MST /noon MDT/ this morning to 7 PM MST /8 PM MDT/ this evening. For the High Wind Warning, from 11 AM MST /noon MDT/ to 7 PM MST /8 PM MDT/ Tuesday.
* IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Areas of blowing dust will lead to reduced visibilities, resulting in hazardous driving conditions. Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects.
info.instruction:
Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
Winds this strong will make driving extremely difficult, especially for high profile vehicles, such as RVs, campers, and tractor trailers. Use extreme caution and avoid unnecessary travel.
Secure loose outdoor objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles, such as RVs, campers, and tractor trailers. Use extra caution.

parameter.value: WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MST /NOON MDT/ THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MST /8 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County
